channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Joaquin Niemann Wins MVP, Bryson DeChambeau Gets Drive of the Year at LIV Golf Showcase
item.description: Here were the awards passed out during the inaugural LIV Golf Showcase on Thursday.

item.title: FOX Super 6 Contest: Chris 'The Bear' Fallica's NFL Conference Title Predictions
item.description: Enter the free NFL Conference Championship Super 6 Contest for a chance to win cash prizes! And don't worry — Chris 'The Bear' Fallica is here to help...

item.title: 2025 NFL Conference Championship Picks: Best Bet For Each Game — Will's Wagers
item.description: Will Hill delivers his best bets for Conference Championship Weekend, as well as a Super Bowl futures bet.

item.title: PayPal Betting Sites 2026: Top Sportsbooks that Accept PayPal
item.description: We review the best sports betting websites that take PayPal, including – bet365 (our #1 pick), DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, and more.

item.title: College Basketball Games of the Week: Smith, Dybansta Headline Stars in Action
item.description: Don't miss BYU's AJ Dybansta and Purdue's Bradne Smith lighting up the court! Here are the men's and women's college basketball games of the week.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi league eyes Salah, Vinícius Jr. plus 50 more
item.description: The Saudi Pro League has big plans to sign Liverpool's Mohamed Salah and Real Madrid's Vinícius Júnior. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Why the Broncos are confident in backup QB Jarrett Stidham: 'We have full faith in Stiddy'
item.description: The circumstances behind Stidham's AFC title game start haven't been seen since 1972, but the Broncos believe in their backup quarterback.

item.title: Can Sam Darnold overcome his nemesis -- the L.A. Rams -- to get to Super Bowl?
item.description: Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold has struggled with turnovers against the Rams. Will Sunday be different?

item.title: 'She fired everyone': Inside the Buss family's $10B sale of the Lakers
item.description: The post-Jerry Buss era was defined by resentment, dysfunction and conflict -- and ended with the loss of the most valuable family-owned franchise in ...

item.title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with George, Markkanen and six other trending players
item.description: Helping you decide whether to give up on a few struggling players or believe in those who are ascending.
